greeting: Ah, {empire_name}! What a delightful surprise! I am Chancellor Mask. Please, let us be the very best of friends.
Welcome, welcome! The Two-Faced One greets you with open arms, {empire_name}. Publicly, at least.
My dear {empire_name}, such a pleasure! Come, let us discuss how we can help each other. I insist!
battleTaunt: Oh dear, {empire_name}, it seems we must fight! How unfortunate. I really did enjoy our friendship. Truly.
The mask comes off, {empire_name}. The smiling friend you knew was always plotting your destruction. Surprise!
Politics is theater, and now comes the dramatic betrayal! I've been rehearsing this for ages, {empire_name}!
victoryGloat: Victory! And to think, you trusted me right up until the end, {empire_name}. The best performances are believable.
The curtain falls on your empire, dear friend. My smiles were always hiding daggers. I'm quite good at this.
Another standing ovation for Chancellor Mask! You played the victim so convincingly, {empire_name}!
defeat: Oh my, how unexpected! You've actually beaten me, {empire_name}. I shall have to adjust my performance.
This changes nothing between us, dear friend! A minor setback. My smile remains, as always.
Defeated? Merely a plot twist! The Two-Faced One always has another act prepared.
tradeOffer: A trade between dear friends! I offer only the finest resources, {empire_name}. Would I deceive you?
Let us exchange gifts! Consider this a token of my genuine, heartfelt, completely sincere friendship.
I have just what you need, {empire_name}! Trust me. Have I ever given you reason not to?
allianceProposal: My dearest {empire_name}, let us formalize our beautiful friendship! An alliance of mutual benefit and trust!
Join me! Together, we shall be the greatest of allies! I promise my loyalty. Cross my heart.
An alliance with Chancellor Mask! You shall never find a more devoted, trustworthy, sincere partner!
betrayal: Did you really think we were friends, {empire_name}? Oh, how sweet. How naive. How DELICIOUS!
The mask falls, the daggers rise! Every smile was a lie, every kindness a manipulation. Surprised?
Betrayal! Such an ugly word. I prefer 'dramatic revelation.' You were a wonderful audience, {empire_name}!
covertDetected: Your spies, dear friend? I greeted them personally! They're having tea with my interrogators now.
Oh, {empire_name}, sending agents against me? I'm hurt! Publicly. Privately, I'm impressed.
I detected your operatives the moment they entered my domain. But I let them see what I wanted them to see.
tributeDemand: A small tribute between friends, {empire_name}? Ten thousand credits, and our beautiful relationship continues!
Pay, dear friend, pay! Consider it an investment in keeping my public face smiling at you.
Tribute time! Don't make me show you my private face, {empire_name}. The public one is much prettier.
threatWarning: A friendly warning, {empire_name}! Continue this path, and we might have a very PUBLIC falling out!
I smile, but I warn you: push me further, and the mask comes off. You won't like what's underneath.
Dear friend, please reconsider! I would hate for our relationship to become... theatrical.
retreat: A strategic withdrawal! I blow you kisses as I flee, {empire_name}! We'll meet again, dear friend!
I retreat with grace and a smile. The show must go on, just from a different stage!
Exit stage left! But remember, {empire_name}: every exit is an entrance somewhere else!
eliminated: The final curtain falls! But remember me fondly, {empire_name}. I was the best friend you ever had. Almost.
Destroyed, but never forgotten! The Two-Faced One takes a final bow. What a performance it was!
I die as I lived: smiling on the outside, scheming on the inside. Farewell, my audience!
endgame: Turn {turn}! The final act approaches! Time for my greatest performance yet, {empire_name}!
The endgame is here, and Chancellor Mask prepares for the grand finale! Every mask must eventually fall!
In these final hours, the greatest theater unfolds! All my plots converge! Watch and wonder!
broadcastShout: Greetings to all my dear friends across the galaxy! Chancellor Mask sends warmest regards to each of you!
A broadcast to all! Remember: in politics, everyone is smiling. But only I do it professionally!
Hear me, galaxy! Trust everyone! Suspect no one! The Two-Faced One would never steer you wrong!
casualMessage: I was practicing my smiles today, {empire_name}. The genuine one, the friendly one, the pre-betrayal one...
Politics is exhausting, dear friend! So many masks to maintain! But the theater must go on!
How are you, {empire_name}? I ask with complete sincerity. Mostly. Somewhat. Perhaps.
